short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pirate Clash Royale! Marooned on a tropical isle with other pirates, only one will prevail to plunder the booty and reign as king

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can join the Pirate Clash using the system's code or participate via the referral code of other pirates.
System code: LjYy4f65Go

Ready to live the pirate's life?

Ahoy, matey! It's time to distinguish friend from foe!

Bring your mates aboard... then raid their lands, pillage their treasures, and witness their islands go Boom!
Forge your pirate empire and fend off the retaliation of your fellow pirates!
